items.content_html: swiftenv is a lightweight, zero-dependency environment variable manager designed to make handling environment variables easier and more efficient for developers. It offers a range of powerful features to help you load, get, validate, set, and remove environment variables effortlessly
items.title: victorexpounder/swiftenv: swiftenv is a lightweight, zero-dependency environment variable manager designed to make handling environment variables easier and more efficient for developers. It offers a range of powerful features to help you load, get, validate, set, and remove environment variables effortlessly

items.content_html: LiteJsonDB is a lightweight, local JSON database for Node.js. It provides a simple and intuitive API for managing JSON data. This package is a fork of the Python LiteJsonDB project, adapted for Node.js, and is currently about 45% complete
items.title: codingtuto/LiteJsonDB-Node: LiteJsonDB is a lightweight, local JSON database for Node.js. It provides a simple and intuitive API for managing JSON data. This package is a fork of the Python LiteJsonDB project, adapted for Node.js, and is currently about 45% complete

items.content_html: NFSFU234 Form Validation is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed for validating HTML form elements, with a special emphasis on textarea fields. It offers customizable validation messages, comprehensive support for required field checks, seamless inline error displays, and convenient modal error notifications.
items.title: NFSFU234FormValidation/nfsfu234-form-validation: NFSFU234 Form Validation is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed for validating HTML form elements, with a special emphasis on textarea fields. It offers customizable validation messages, comprehensive support for required field checks, seamless inline error displays, and convenient modal error notifications.
